title: Winter's Cozy Warmth

diffuser.notes: Enjoy the invigorating aroma, especially after exercise or a long winter walk.

spray_optional.note: Shake well before use, and keep away from heat sources.

why_it_works: The spicy warmth of cinnamon and pine, combined with the woody, earthy tone of frankincense, evoke feelings of comfort and relaxation.
safety: Avoid eyes/mucosa; keep from children & pets.
Consult a professional if pregnant, nursing, or under care.
